mapper.select: /* cgBoard.view */ SELECT UID ,BBS_UID ,GROUP_UID ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,FILE_UID ,THUMB_UID ,REG_UID ,REG_DT ,UPDT_UID ,UPDT_DT ,DELETE_AT FROM CASH_GUARD.CG_BOARD WHERE UID = #{uid}

/* cgBoard.getDetail */ SELECT CBBS.UID AS BBS_UID ,CBBS.BBS_NM AS BBS_NM ,CBBS.BBS_TP_CD AS BBS_TP_CD ,CASE WHEN CBBS.BBS_TP_CD = 'NOTICE' THEN '공지사항' WHEN CBBS.BBS_TP_CD = 'BOARD' THEN '자유 게시판' WHEN CBBS.BBS_TP_CD = 'QNA' THEN '질의 응답' WHEN CBBS.BBS_TP_CD = 'FAQ' THEN 'faq' END AS BBS_TP_CD_NM ,CGROUP.UID AS GROUP_UID ,CGROUP.GROUP_NM AS GROUP_NM ,CBOARD.UID AS BOARD_UID ,CBOARD.TITLE AS TITLE ,CBOARD.CONTENT AS CONTENT ,CBOARD.FILE_UID AS FILE_UID ,CBOARD.THUMB_UID AS THUMB_UID ,CBOARD.DELETE_AT AS DELETE_AT ,CBOARD.REG_UID AS REG_UID ,CBOARD.REG_DT AS REG_DT ,CU_REG.USER_NM AS REG_NM ,CBOARD.UPDT_UID AS UPDT_UID ,CBOARD.UPDT_DT AS UPDT_DT ,CU_UPDT.USER_NM AS UPDR_NM FROM CASH_GUARD.CG_BOARD CBOARD INNER JOIN CASH_GUARD.CG_BBS CBBS ON CBBS.UID = CBOARD.BBS_UID INNER JOIN CASH_GUARD.CG_GROUP CGROUP ON CGROUP.UID = CBOARD.GROUP_UID LEFT JOIN CASH_GUARD.CG_USER CU_REG ON CU_REG.UID = CBOARD.REG_UID LEFT JOIN CASH_GUARD.CG_USER CU_UPDT ON CU_UPDT.UID = CBOARD.UPDT_UID WHERE CBOARD.UID = #{uid}
